book.onGroundCrafting.itemName: Vanilla Magic On Ground Crafting Recipes
book.onGroundCrafting.title: On Ground Crafting Recipes
book.onGroundCrafting.desc: To craft items, drop them on the same block on ground and right-click that block with Stick in Your right hand.
vm.gui.questGui.title: Vanilla Magic Quests
quest.spellFlintAndSteel.desc: Right-click on a block to put the block on fire.
quest.spellLargeFireball.desc: Right-click to shoot huge exploding fireball.
quest.spellTeleport.desc: Right-click to teleport where You are pointing at.
quest.jumper.desc: Shift-right-click block to save position. Shift-right-click in air to teleport.
quest.spellTeleportToNether.desc: Right-click to teleport. (Pssst go higher... 60+ is safe... I think)
quest.spellTeleportToEnd.desc: Right-click to teleport. (You can't go back until You kill the Dragon)
quest.spellSummonMeteor.desc: Right-click to summon Meteor from the sky.
quest.spellPullEntityToPlayer.desc: Right-click while pointing at any entity to pull it to You.
quest.spellFreezeWater3x3.desc: Right-click to freeze the water in 3x3 radius.
quest.evokerCrystal.desc: Craft Evoker Crystal in Altar. Hold Evoker Crystal in right-hand. Right-Click to cast currently selected Spell. Shift-Right-Click to change selected Spell.
quest.shootWitherSkull.desc: Right-click in air to shoot Wither Skull.
quest.mobSpawnerDropBlock.desc: Break Mob Spawner. It will drop Block and Book with Entity data from Spawner. Right-click with this Book in right hand on Spawner to set Spawner to the Entity from Book.
quest.buildAltarTier1.desc: Build a 3x3 circle and place a Cauldron in the middle.
quest.craftGunpowder.desc: Toss ingredients into the Altar and Right-click.
quest.craftSugar.desc: Toss ingredients into the Altar and Right-click.
quest.craftDirt.desc: Toss ingredients into the Altar and Right-click.
quest.craftSand.desc: Toss ingredients into the Altar and Right-click.
quest.craftGlass.desc: Toss ingredients into the Altar and Right-click.
quest.craftSnow.desc: Toss ingredients into the Altar and Right-click.
quest.craftIce.desc: Toss ingredients into the Altar and Right-click.
quest.craftCobblestone.desc: Toss ingredients into the Altar and Right-click.
quest.craftGravel.desc: Toss ingredients into the Altar and Right-click.
quest.craftLeather.desc: Toss ingredients into the Altar and Right-click.
quest.craftClay.desc: Toss ingredients into the Altar and Right-click.
quest.buildAltarTier2.desc: Add 1 block on each corner, but one layer lower than Cauldron and replace the Cauldron.
quest.craftIronOre.desc: Toss ingredients into the Altar and Right-click.
quest.toolUpgrade.desc: Toss ingredients into the Altar and Right-click.
quest.itemUpgrades.desc: Toss ingredients into the Altar and Right-click.
quest.craftCactus.desc: Toss ingredients into the Altar and Right-click.
quest.craftSapling0.desc: Toss ingredients into the Altar and Right-click.
quest.craftSapling1.desc: Toss ingredients into the Altar and Right-click.
quest.craftSapling2.desc: Toss ingredients into the Altar and Right-click.
quest.craftSapling3.desc: Toss ingredients into the Altar and Right-click.
quest.craftSapling4.desc: Toss ingredients into the Altar and Right-click.
quest.craftSapling5.desc: Toss ingredients into the Altar and Right-click.
quest.craftSapling6: Craft Oak Sapling from Dark Oak
quest.craftSapling6.desc: Toss ingredients into the Altar and Right-click.
quest.craftPumpkin.desc: Toss ingredients into the Altar and Right-click.
quest.craftMelon.desc: Toss ingredients into the Altar and Right-click.
quest.craftVine.desc: Toss ingredients into the Altar and Right-click.
quest.craftLiyPad.desc: Toss ingredients into the Altar and Right-click.
quest.craftSlimeBall.desc: Toss ingredients into the Altar and Right-click.
quest.buildAltarTier3.desc: Add 1 block on each side but one layer lower than Cauldron. 3 blocks away from the center and replace the Cauldron.
quest.smeltOnAltar.desc: Toss smeltable items into Altar and right-click, also hold fuel (i.e. Coal).
quest.accelerant.desc: Speeds up ticks of nearby blocks. Shift-right-click the Cauldron.
quest.motherNatureCrystal.desc: Apply bonemeal to nearby blocks on each tick.
quest.arrowMachineGun.desc: Take any Arrow and Right-click (or hold).
quest.craftGoldIngot.desc: Toss ingredients into the Altar and Right-click.
quest.blockAbsorber.desc: Shift-right-click the Hopper. Hopper will absorb any block from above.
quest.buildAltarTier4.desc: Add 1 block on each corner of Altar one layer lower than Cauldron and replace the Cauldron.
quest.craftRottenFlesh.desc: Toss ingredients into the Altar and Right-click.
quest.craftString.desc: Toss ingredients into the Altar and Right-click.
quest.craftSpiderEye.desc: Toss ingredients into the Altar and Right-click.
quest.craftBone.desc: Toss ingredients into the Altar and Right-click.
quest.craftArrow.desc: Toss ingredients into the Altar and Right-click.
quest.craftEnderPearl.desc: Toss ingredients into the Altar and Right-click.
quest.buildAltarTier5.desc: Add 1 block on each side of the Altar one layer lower than Cauldron, 5 blocks away from the center and replace the Cauldron.
quest.craftGlowstoneDust.desc: Toss ingredients into the Altar and Right-click.
quest.craftNetherrack.desc: Toss ingredients into the Altar and Right-click.
quest.craftSoulSand.desc: Toss ingredients into the Altar and Right-click.
quest.craftMagmaBlock.desc: Toss ingredients into the Altar and Right-click.
quest.craftNetherWart.desc: Toss ingredients into the Altar and Right-click.
quest.craftGhastTear.desc: Toss ingredients into the Altar and Right-click.
quest.questMoveBlock.desc: Shift-right-click on the Block to take / place it.
quest.captureEntity.desc: Shift-right-click on Entity to capture / release it.
quest.crystallizedLiquid.desc: Toss ingredients into the Altar and Right-click. Right-click to spawn Fluid.
quest.crystallizedLiquid.desc.ingredient: 1x Nether Star, 1x any Bucket with Fluid
quest.liquidSuppressionCrystal.desc: Liquid will vanish around You and after some time will appear.
quest.crystallizedPotion.desc: Toss ingredients into the Altar and Right-click. Hold it in inventory to get the effect of the Potion.
quest.craftWitherSkeletonSkull.desc: Toss 1x Coal Block + 1x Skeleton Head into the Altar Tier 5 and right-click with a Blaze Wand in hand.
quest.accelerationCrystal.desc: Craft it with Nether Star in the middle and Books on top, bottom, left and right. Shift-right-click on block to speed it's ticks. (For instance: speed up Furnace).
quest.buildAltarTier6.desc: Add 1 block of Diamond on each corner of Altar Tier 5 but one layer lower than Cauldron and replace the Cauldron.
quest.inventoryBridge.desc: Save Inventory position into Inventory Selector and hold that item somewhere in main inventory. Hold Blaze Rod in right hand and 1x Stained Glass in left hand and Shift-Right-Click the inventory to place the end of the bridge. Items will be transfered from Inventory Selector's saved inventory to new clicked inventory.
quest.craftDiamond.desc: Toss ingredients into the Altar and Right-click.
quest.buildAltarTier7.desc: Add 1 block of Emerald on each side of the Altar Tier 4 but one layer lower than Cauldron, 7 blocks away from the center (north, south, east, west) and replace the Cauldron.
quest.craftGoldOre.desc: Toss ingredients into the Altar and Right-click.
quest.craftCoalOre.desc: Toss ingredients into the Altar and Right-click.
quest.craftRedstoneOre.desc: Toss ingredients into the Altar and Right-click.
quest.craftLapisOre.desc: Toss ingredients into the Altar and Right-click.
quest.craftDiamondOre.desc: Toss ingredients into the Altar and Right-click.
quest.oreDoubling.desc: Place Cauldron. On each side of the Cauldron place Furnace. Drop ores into Cauldron and right-click with Nether Star in right hand and fuel in left hand.
quest.craftEmeraldOre.desc: Toss ingredients into the Altar and Right-click.
quest.craftEmerald.desc: Toss ingredients into the Altar and Right-click.
quest.craftNetherStar.desc: Toss ingredients into the Altar and Right-click.
quest.itemMagnet.desc: Hold 2 Nether Stars anywhere in Your inventory but as different stacks (1x Nether Star + 1x Nether Star).
quest.craftDragonEgg.desc: Toss ingredients into the Altar and Right-click.
quest.craftDragonHead.desc: Toss ingredients into the Altar and Right-click.
quest.craftEndCrystal.desc: Toss ingredients into the Altar and Right-click.
